text: Tres gros et délicieux sandwich au poulet  Je vais y retourner certains. Endroit très accueillant propre tres courtois

J'ai passé une commande pour livraison et tout est arrivé chaud et la commande était complète.  Les portions sont généreuses et les sauces d'accompagnement sont excellentes.  C'est génial de pouvoir avoir du poulet qui peut-être livré dans ville St-Laurent!  Je le recommande!  :o)
Terrific rotisserie chicken, fair pricing , serves duck, turkey as well. Only tried the chicken it was yummy. Down side when you order everything comes seporate no fries or coleslaw.

I ordered food from them on just eat and I am SO annoyed with their service. It took forever for the food to be delivered when they are only 10 mins away and i had already prepaid with the app... You have to pay extra for the sauce, the dessert is too expensive for what it is.
Worst ever deleivery guy was travelling by bus took em 1h30 to get my food...wasnt good at all

Charming, spotless décor. Enchanting African music on the sound system. Friendly staff.  French-dominant service. Excellent, spicy roast chicken and exceptional French fries. Delicious white sauce. Overall, a very good value for a meal under CDN $ 10.00. My new go-to place for roast chicken. Recommended.
